title: Best Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) screen protectors
description: Protect your Moto G Stylus (2025) display with these screen protectors. The post Best Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Protect your Moto G Stylus (2025) display with these screen protectors.
text: The Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) is the new Android smartphone with stylus support. It has the same 6.7-inch AMOLED display as the previous year, but you do get higher resolution. This panel has a 1,220 x 2,712 pixels resolution with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR support, and 3000 peak brightness. Motorola has offered Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection. If you want complete protection for your display, you will need a screen protector. It will help you avoid scratches, smudges, and other potential issues. Here are the best Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) screen protectors. Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack) This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package. Natbok Screen Protector (2-pack) This 9H-rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away. KAREEN Screen Protectors (2-pack) This is a screen protector with a precise cutout for the front camera and speakers. It offers a smooth glass touch, perfect adhesion, and an anti-fingerprint coating. It offers 9H-rated hardness and only 0.33mm thickness. You get two screen protectors with the package. amFilm Screen Protector (3-pack) It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature a micro-fiber cleaning cloth and a plastic squeeze card. Aiziki Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a 9H rated screen protector with a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic layer. It offers complete edge-to-edge protection from scratches and accidental damage. Its precise design helps with easy installation with no bubbles. MAYtobe Screen Protector (2-pack) This is a budget screen protector with 9H-rated hardness. It claims to maintain touch response and transparency. It has anti-stain and anti-fingerprint properties. There are two screen protectors, tempered film cleaning kits, and dust removal stickers in the package. html:
The Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) is the new Android smartphone with stylus support. It has the same 6.7-inch AMOLED display as the previous year, but you do get higher resolution. This panel has a 1,220 x 2,712 pixels resolution with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR support, and 3000 peak brightness.

Motorola has offered Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection. If you want complete protection for your display, you will need a screen protector. It will help you avoid scratches, smudges, and other potential issues. Here are the best Motorola Moto G Stylus (2025) screen protectors.

Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack)

This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package.

Natbok Screen Protector (2-pack)

This 9H-rated screen protector comes with 2.5D rounded edges. It is said to align perfectly with the phone's curved edges. It has 0.33mm thickness and can withstand a 6-foot drop. Hydrophobic and oleophobic coating keeps fingerprints and sweat away.

KAREEN Screen Protectors (2-pack)

This is a screen protector with a precise cutout for the front camera and speakers. It offers a smooth glass touch, perfect adhesion, and an anti-fingerprint coating. It offers 9H-rated hardness and only 0.33mm thickness. You get two screen protectors with the package.

amFilm Screen Protector (3-pack)

It is an anti-scratch 9H tempered glass screen protector for superior durability. There is an oleophobic coating to keep fingerprints and smudges away. The packages also feature a micro-fiber cleaning cloth and a plastic squeeze card.

Aiziki Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a 9H rated screen protector with a fingerprint-resistant oleophobic layer. It offers complete edge-to-edge protection from scratches and accidental damage. Its precise design helps with easy installation with no bubbles.

MAYtobe Screen Protector (2-pack)

This is a budget screen protector with 9H-rated hardness. It claims to maintain touch response and transparency. It has anti-stain and anti-fingerprint properties. There are two screen protectors, tempered film cleaning kits, and dust removal stickers in the package.
